SALESFORCE HELP

EINSTEIN GENERATIVE AI
Einstein Audit and Feedback Data

Collect and store Einstein generative AI audit and feedback data in Data Cloud and enhance your generative AI applications with feedback analytics, prompt adjustments, and LLM tuning.

Generative AI Audit and Feedback Data
Use generative AI audit data (also known as audit trail) to track Einstein Trust Layer functionality such as data masking and toxicity detection that help ensure the safety and accuracy of the generated response.
Billing Considerations for Audit and Feedback
Data Cloud stores Generative AI audit and feedback data. When you use specific Data Cloud features, it can affect your credit consumption.
Data Model for Generative AI Audit and Feedback
Understand and analyze your Einstein generative AI audit and feedback data using the appropriate data model objects (DMOs). Einstein generative AI audit and feedback data is streamed to a data lake object (DLO) in Data Cloud and then mapped to data model objects (DMO).
Turn On Einstein Generative AI Data Collection and Storage
To collect Einstein generative AI audit and feedback data, turn it on in Einstein Setup.
Share Insights from Einstein Generative AI Audit and Feedback Data
Share insights from your Salesforce org’s Einstein generative AI audit and feedback data with your team using the Einstein Generative AI and Feedback Data reports and the Audit Trail.
Access Einstein Generative AI Audit and Feedback Data Reports and Dashboards
Access the Einstein generative AI audit and feedback reports and dashboards directly from Data Cloud, after turning on the Einstein generative AI data collection and storage. you can access the Einstein generative AI and feedback data dashboard.
Review Einstein Generative AI Audit and Feedback Data in Data Cloud
In Data Cloud, you can create workflows to raise notifications when you receive specific types of Generative AI audit and feedback data.
